text: How to append two strings in Python?
I have done this operation millions of times, just using the + operator!
I have no idea why  it is not working this time, it is overwriting the first part of the string with the new one!
I have a list of strings and just want to concatenate them in one single string!
If I run the program from Eclipse it works, from the command-line it doesn't!
I want to discard the first and the last elements, the code is:
